values:
thanks lerin! i was bored and you fixed me for a few minutes haha...



1. What is your current ringtone? my default is "xplosive" by dr dre and nate dogg, and i love it. for jenny and kristi, it's "beautiful night"...for rose and sunny it's "god damn beautiful"....for rich, it's velvet revolver's "superhuman"...and for corey and casey, it's "dirty sanchez"......and for the baby alan, it's some crazy techno crap that makes me happy

2. What is your current wallpaper? it's a really pretty pinstripe thing

3. Do you own a picture phone? no i'm still ghetto...i upgrade in octoba

4. If so, what was the last picture you took? fuck you

5. Go to your text message inbox and type what the 10th message from the top says? oh lord, let's see. it says "Aw, i miss my katie. xoxo" from the baby...like 20 seconds after i left his work from visiting him.. aww love

6. How many contacts do you have on your phone? ugh i don't know.. 98, wow haha

7. Go to your missed calls. Last missed one was from? jennifer renee fieldo

8. Who was the last person you spoke to on your cell phone? jennifer renee fieldie

9. What service do you have? cingular! WOO

10. At this very moment, how many bars do you have for your service/battery? 0/5 for service, and full battery

11. Who's on your speed dial number 5? spencer maria consuela conrad

12. Do you have voicemail? yeah i have one from my mom but i don't want to check it because i'm almost certain it's completely gay and pointless haha

13. How many contacts that start with the letter J do you have? 16, whoa baby

14. Who do you call the most? hmm, jen or rach..sometimes rich..and my brother

15. How many text messages do you get a month? 1000

16. Can you send pictures? nope

17. What are the last 4 digits to your number? 3481

18. Go to your sent texts, what does the eighth one say? haha there is no telling, i don't save my sent ones... it was probably something dirty

19. What about the 15th? still probably something dirty

20. Who's the last person that you called? my momma on my way home from work

21. The last person that called you? jenny poo

22. Last person that texted you? sunny the other day

23. Last person you added to your contacts? hmm... today i added the number for the dude i have to take training classes for for my new job..good ol kevin johnston...he's a bruiser, let me tell ya

24. How many minutes are on your plan? dude i don't know that crap

25. Do you like your phone? she's mah boo.......we've been through a lot together.....once i spilled miller lite all over her and she was deaf and mute for a while, but somehow pulled through....then i dropped her in the guadalupe river and she recovered like a champ.....not to mention all the times ive thrown and/or dropped her....ill be sad in october when it's time for my upgrade....it's been a wild ride darling, but i'm gonna have to put you out to pasture sometime, you know. .....tear. :(


goodnight, my babies. i love each and every one of you, as often as i can.  ;) xoxo
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/6204.html

i am so happy!

alan is amazing. <3

star wars kicked ALL KINDS of ass.  totally worth the two hour wait and dorky feelings in the theater last night haha.  we left austin at like 9pm....got to san marcos about 930.  stood in the huge ass line for about 10 minutes and then they let us in the theater at about 10.  we played spider solitaire on alan's sidekick for a while...did some crossword puzzles and cheated (robert SHAW played in jaws...sheesh)....then midnight FINALLY rolled around and the movie started...and the music...i thought there were going to be some cardiac arrests...for sure.

good times.  i love my new san marcos friends aww.

alexandra left me yesterday.  i miss her face already :(

alright, fuck it....i'm going back to lounging around.  this is too much work for me. hahahhaha how sad.  kisses for my many lovers!!!!!!!

<3 k

hey lovelies.  wanna hear a song that makes me cry?  yeah it goes a little somethin like this............

Turn down the lights
Turn down the bed
Turn down these voices inside my head
Lay down with me
Tell me no lies
Just hold me close, don't patronize
Don't patronize me

Cause I can't make you love me if you don't
You can't make your heart feel something it won't
Here in the dark, in these final hours
I will lay down my heart, and I'll feel the power
But you won't
No you won't
Cause I can't make you love me if you don't

I'll close my eyes
Then I won't see
The love you don't feel when you're holding me
Morning will come
And I'll do what's right
Just give me till then to give up this fight
And I will give up this fight!

Cause I can't make you love me if you don't
You can't make your heart feel something it won't
Here in the dark, in these final hours
I will lay down my heart, and I'll feel the power
But you won't
No you won't
Cause I can't make you love me....if you don't

so i don't feel like writing about how shitty i'm feeling.  bite my ass.  here's a survey..

A - Age you got your first kiss: wow uh i was like 5 or 6??  haha it was steamy hot..fa sho
B - Band you're listening to right now: gotta be those eagles of death metal..LOVE
C - Crush: yes indeed..and it's totally irrational and stupid but heyyyy that's how i roll
D - Dad's name: Morris! MO MO if ya nasty..hahaha
E - Easiest person to talk to: jenny and rose..
F - Favorite artists/bands at the moment: who's got a guess???  why yes, that's correct..the burden brothers.  also the eagles of death metal, jeff buckley, black tie dynasty, and of course the good ol toadies mmm
G - Gummy bears or gummy worms: gummy worms..i like to bite them in half where the color changes..i'm an OCD freak i know
H - Hometown: mont belvieu REPRESENT BITCHES
I - Instruments: air drums.  don't even act like you gots skillz cuz ill shut yo ass down.  word.
K - Kids: none to speak of..FOR NOW ahhhh haha kidding
L - Longest car ride ever: shit umm..longest time without stopping is definitely the 16 hours STRAIGHT to florida with the jenny and the krusti and the reesh..to see the one and only burden brothers hahah that was a fun trip..wait no..by fun i of course mean MISERABLE
M - Mom's name: Mrs. Chambless, janey, cham cham, aunt janey, momma chambless..the list goes on
N - Nicknames: katie, kate, kay kay, kparx, katydid, sugarbear (CHAMBLESS ONLY), boobs mcgee
O - One wish: that being a fucking DECENT person wouldn't be so hard to do for some people
P - Phobia[s]: i don't like being chased..or held down and tickled.  seriously i will fuck you up if you try that shit.  and i used to be deathly afraid of cheetahs.  yep.  cheetahs.
Q - Quote: "i like too many things and get confused and hung-up running from one falling star to another till i drop. this is the night, what it does to you. i had nothing to offer anybody but my own confusion." -jack kerouac
R - Reason to smile: if you had friends like mine, you wouldn't have to ask
S - Song you sang last: "Laughing City" by Eisley
T - Time you woke up [today]: um 930, then 1030, then 1130, and then noon hahaha i kept resetting my stupid alarm
U - Unknown fact about me: hmm i'm never satisfied.
V - Vegetable you hate: i like all vegetables at some point or another..right now i hate asparagus but that could change
W - Worst habit(s): brushing my hair (i don't think it's bad but everyone laughs at me haha especially when i do it in the middle of a rock show haha), putting things off, being spoiled, not being able to say no to him
X - X-rays you've had: never had an xray actually..damn i'm good.
Y - Yummy food: hmm anything my mom makes.. also seafood enchiladas from papasitos, or kerbey queso from kerbey lane HOLY MOSES...also anything from luna's haha where i hope to be in 20 years with rach, jen and spin drinking margaritas and wearing thin tennis shoes and cackling in the smoking section..it's a wonderful dream..
Z - Zodiac sign: sagittarius BITCH
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/5560.html

i have bell's palsy.

the left side of my face is temporarily paralyzed hahahaha.  it's completely scary and totally hilarious.

i had some terrible sinuses..which caused an ear infection..which caused my ear drum to rupture..which caused the facial nerves that go through the inner ear canal to get all fucked up.  so now my smile is all crooked and it's hard to close my left eye for real.

it's quite embarrassing actually.  i don't think i'll be leaving my room for a while haha.  and on top of all that shit, i have an eye infection on that side too.  i am totally falling apart.  and yes, in case you were wondering..it DOES suck.  lots of ass.

if anything else goes wrong on the left side of my face, i will let you guys know.  but i don't know if there is any space left on it that is NOT fucked up right now.  i hate bell's palsy.  and eye infections.  and you.

ha haaa not really.  i love.

sorry to whine about all that.  i'm really in a worse mood than this entry lets on.  boy troubles and whatnot.  but it's not their fault..it's all mine really.  well i suppose maybe some of it can be blamed on the ONE.  he and i are both just stupid idiots who can't move on from each other, and we apparently find some kind of sick joy in making ourselves miserable.  yaaaaay!  but derek on the other hand..is absolutely wonderful.  amazing even.  so that's enough to keep me going.  :)

okay so...

i showed holland my freak eye and she thought it was the funniest thing she'd ever seen.  what a bitch!  how dare you mock my abnormalities!  I'LL FUCKIN KILL YOU!!!!  hahahahah just kiddingggg..

so yeah.  i have to agree with her though, because it IS really weird.  but i like it.  because I'M weird.  so bite my ass all you normal-eyed people.  i don't have shit to say to you!

haha just kidding again.  i get defensive about my freak eyes.  and now after all the glorious suspense......here it is......i give youuu........

......

my left eye!

dude i'm cool, i don't care what you bitches say.  haha thanks for tuning in to the freak show.  <3

alright.

so, i get on the UT bus today to go to school.  and we stop on lakeshore to pick up more people.  and one of these people is this kid who gets on every MWF at 1230, which is when i'm going to my ancient rome class.  and he has an artificial right leg.  and every fucking time he gets on, the bus driver takes off too early and he falls down, sometimes into a seat if he's lucky.

it pisses me off beyond anything every time and ruins my day from there on out.

why can't people pay more attention to each other and just FUCKING BE DECENT PEOPLE.

...

SHIT.
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/4368.html

fuck.

i'm not fucking stupid.

can somebody tell me when the hell i turned into a stupid ass?

FUCK.

this shit has to go away.  i can't let these feelings just sit there.  it's fucking ridiculous, i tell you!

i wish i could just let my fears go, and let myself feel how wonderful i know it could be, but i'm too smart for this!

and that reminds me of a song, boys and girls...

-------------------------------------------------------
Don't stray, don't ever go away 
I should be much too smart for this 
You know it gets the better of me sometimes
When you and I collide
I fall into an ocean of you
Pull me out in time, don't let me drown 
Let me down
I say it's all because of you
And here I go, losing my control 
I'm practicing your name
So I can say it to your face
It doesn't seem right to look you in the eye 
And let all the things you mean to me 
Come tumbling out my mouth
Indeed it's time, tell you why 
I say it's infinitely true

Say you'll stay 
Don't come and go 
Like you do 
Sway my way 
Yeah I need to know 
All about you

And there's no cure, and no way to be sure 
Why everything's turned inside out 
Instilling so much doubt 
It makes me so tired; I feel so uninspired 
My head is battling with my heart 
My logic has been torn apart 
And now it all turns sour 
Come sweeten every afternoon

Say you'll stay 
Don't come and go 
Like you do 
Sway my way 
Yeah I need to know 
All about you
-------------------------------------------------------

ugh.

fuck this.

goodnight.
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/4322.html

well hello there, my lovers.

just sitting here at the ol apartment on a sunday night.  putting off reading my book about religion in ancient rome.  we really need to tone down the excitement in here, boys and girls.

so yeah.  i'm writing a lot tonight.

last night was fucking...incredible.  haha incredibly amazing.  amazingly superb.  yeah i had a good time, can you tell?  and i'm not the only one, baby..hahhah.

the show was fantastic.  plinko and the guest opened for the burden brothers.  i really love the guest.  they're bad ass, for serious.  and rose surprised me with her presence and i was SO excited!  she had told me earlier that she wouldn't be able to make it.  then it worked out to where she could, and she told craig not to tell me because she wanted to surprise me at the show.  but then when we got to the venue, we ran into the guys and i was talking to casey and he's like "yeah, well rose is downstairs, so we're going to run to the hotel..we'll be back at like 1030."  i was like WHATTTT hahaha, so casey ruined the secrets.  oh well, poor little bronco..he didn't know any better.

so the boys show back up during the guest's set.  we called corey over to look at his newly pierced nose and then find out that he got a tattoo that day as well.  and taz's new tattoo was my favorite.  it's a mosquito on his arm and it says "suck it" underneath it hahaha.  aww and tazzy's daddy was there!  that was kinda weird and awesome at the same time.

so they go on.  they opened with "god damn beautiful" which is always a treat.  the crowd goes insane on that one.  because it's hot.  they played everything i wanted to hear.  my favorites "she's not home" "conditional" "stay with me" (hell yeah, rod stewart!), "walk all over you" and of course they closed with "dirty sanchez."  wonderful....

hanging out afterwards was a blast, as always.  great conversation with rich and my love casey hess backstage.  then we all sang a wonderful song in the dressing room for john jansky hahahahhah.  and of course, everyone got to see corey's white ass.  vaden was traumatized..like he's never seen it pssh.  then taz, hess and corey all made out together.  it was so hot.  hahahahah..

then it was my turn.  making out on the sidewalk of a small town square under a streetlight on a cold, rainy night.  does it get any hotter?  i submit that it does not.  you understand if you know who it was i was making out with.  gaaaah.  and if you don't..sorry, you're missing out haha.  that is all i have to say about that. wait, mmmmmmmmmmmmmm.  okay, NOW that is all.

and the night only got better from there.  who knew?!

well it's about that time.  i should get back to reading.  i love learning!

and i love you too.  and you and you and you.  but not so much you.  you, i can do without. <333
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/4050.html

good evening, boys and girls.

i haven't updated all yeaaaar.  insanity.

so yeah.  not much is different.  still up here in austin.  boredom is the standard for every day.  blah.

school is going fine.  i like my anthropology class a lot.  mainly because we get to study tarsiers and they are the cutest little fuckers ever.  seriously go look for a picture of one.  they will make you go AAAAAAAAAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW.  and i get to play with their skeletons!  woo hoo!

alex came over tonight and it was great.  he's a good kid..really good hahahaha.  then we went to wendy's and that was great too.  yay for being a cheap date!  he wants me to go to a concert with him tonight but i am hanging out with the baby andus.  if he ever gets his ass over here to get me.  that asshole.  hahaha just kidding, i love.  aww and he called me during "konstantine" and i got to sing along.  alex called me a nerdo when i was singing in wendy's.  that bitch.

sooooooo anyway.  burden this weekend in san marcos.  i get to bring my dusty hardy to the show..it's been FOREVER since i've seen him.  should be a great show..always is at lucy's.  i do so love those burdens!

alright ando is about to come get me so i will go now.  here's hoping it's fun over at la quinta!

love all around and back around again...several times. <333333333

katieee
http://and-she-runs.livejournal.com/3585.html

happy birthday to the little baby andy!

though he is no longer a little baby..he's a big boy now.

alright bitches, i will be home later on today or tonight.

and andus..you'd better go to the HOUSE with me before i leave friday.  that place misses me, i know.  i need some hashies..scattered, smothered and chunked, if you please.  and jenny, i won't be here for your lovely birthday :(  so we must go eat..or something more productive haha.

okay i must go take my final final of the semester.  yays

love all around <3

Blah.  Today is very boring, but it's okay because I don't really feel like doing anything.  I stayed home and watched some Olympic swimming with my Mommy because I love her so.

Not really, but that would be quite a sight.  Oh and I'm still mad that I left my backwards/sideways trucker hat with my initials on it at home, otherwise I would have fit right in and that would have been so damn cool.  Haha I love it.  Then we got bored and went to Phillie Cheese Steak's house to watch the boys play poker.  Me and Jenn are the official cheerleaders (also the only girls ever) at Phil's Poker Nights haha.  After the poker got boring, me, Jenn, Andresicus and Justie went to Justie's house to play Nintendo and listen to Jimmy Eat World haha.  Some top-level secrets were disclosed, but it's okay.  It was a pretty laid-back night but all in all it was good times once again.

I got new sheets and new bath stuffs for my new apartment, thanks to my magnificent, marvelous, Great Aunt Jane.  I am way excited and I need to be able to move in today.  I want to go see Jesse and Jeremy and James's new place..I hear it's awesome, but I will have to decide for myself.  Jenn is under oath now that she's going to come visit me in Austin ASAP..we will have crazy times I swear it.  I keep seeing people I haven't seen in so long and it's making me sad that I'm leaving, but I know I will see them again at least this semester. Blah I hope we don't all drift apart too soon.

Oh well enough complaining..it's a happy day.  Happy Days are yours and mine, Happy Days!  Alright well I'm gonna go eat some chicken salad because it is scrumptious haha that was for Jenn.  There may also be some morsels involved, but I'll get back to you on that.  Love!

Oh baby.  That's all I have to say.  Man, I didn't even get to take a nap today, but it was okay because I woke up at 1:30pm anyway hahaha.  That's terrible and I need a job badly.  I have no moneys!

Tonight was pretty fun.  I went to Galveston with Jenn, Kristi and Doctor Dre.  We drove around so long trying to figure out a place to eat that everything closed and we had to freakin go to Waffle House.  That's okay though because I had my lovely hashbrowns (scattered, covered, and chunked) mmm.  I am so full I could go all day tomorrow without eating again haha.  I almost got a tattoo also.  I've finally decided what I want.  I want a little heart colored in like the Texas flag, aww it's going to be beautiful.  Me and Kristi almost got attacked by a creepy crowd outside JuJu's.  I have never been eye-raped by so many people at once.  I was scared for my life haha.  I'm glad we didn't pretend to be lesbians like Jenn and Andy wanted us to, haha we would definitely be dead right now.  Despite being almost killed by the crowd and by Kristi's driving, it was a pretty fun night.

I don't have much on the schedule for tomorrow.  I guess I'll hang out with Mammy Chammy.  She seems lonely lately because everyone's leaving.  Scott's in California for like a week, Jesse never comes home, and I'm about to move to Austin so she's having a lot of abandonment problems.  Everytime I leave the house she tells me how much she loves me and to be careful like 3487 times.  I hate seeing her like that and it makes me not want to leave her, but I know she wants me to and she wants me to be happy up there so I pretend not to notice that she cries when I leave.  It breaks my heart, but I probably don't know half of what she goes through with all this.  Okay that's enough sadness.

I move in in a week..next Friday.  I'm so scared and excited, it's crazy.  I have to start deciding what all to take (as in clothes and crap).  I've decided that I have way too much stuff.  Jesse and Jeremy signed their lease for their house on campus today.  I am so excited for them..and I will be hanging out there between classes and stuff so get ready boys haha.  AHH I can't wait to move..it's going to be wonderful until I get lonely and start making phone calls begging people to drive 3 hours from Baytown to come visit me!  But it's worth the trip, I promise hahaha.

Anyway, I'm gonna go and quit dropping hints to everyone to come visit me (nudge, nudge).  Haha alrighty goodnight..I love you!
